channel.title: Encode / Decode / Hash dialog on OWASP ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in Encode / Decode / Hash dialog on OWASP ZAP

item.title: Options Encode/Decode screen
item.description: Options Encode/Decode screen This screen allows you to configure the Encode/Decode/Hash options: Base64 - Charset Allows the user to select which character set should be used for Base64 conversions. Base64 - Break Lines Indicates whether or not Base64 encoding should break lines at 76 characters (MIME standard).
